overview: Once upon a time, there was a brother and sister named Hansel and Gretel who get lost in the forest.  The father searches actively his children with the help of the Herb Fairy Marie.  The lost siblings wander around for a while, and then they find a house of gingerbread, biscuit and chocolate.  A witch kindly invites the children, but behind the sweet temptation lurks danger ...
title: Hänsel und Gretel
